question: Noted theatre artiste Paramananda Sahu, who passed away recently, was from which state?
explanation: Renowened theatre artiste of Odisha, Paramananda Sahu (72) has passed away in Balasore Â on 30th of November . He had directed and acted in more than a hundred dramas, besides being an artiste in All India Radio (AIR) and Doordarshan.
